A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As if it wasn't already clear\, we can now fully see what Disney intends to do with the Star Wars franchise. This film was a pitiful display of corporate values through the form of over-used cutesy characters\, frequent over the top forced comedy during serious moments\, and loosely connected plot elements strewn together through serious writing gymnastics. Unfortunately as it stands\, this is the worst film of the franchise.
